resources.string: Welcome to lokalite mobile! Here you\'ll find a tutorial on the application as well as the background on the company.

lokalite is a small, Boulder-based, startup company specializing in the distribution of information and advertisements. lokalite plans to showcase events and organization profiles of local businesses within the community. For the time being, the company plans on targeting the Boulder community for its clients. The events and organizations advertised through lokalite will be from Boulder. lokalite will expand to cover events and organizations to other cities and states.

 Through lokalite mobile! users are able to access an Events List, Organizations List, and a Featured Content from the lokalite server. The Events List and Organizations List is organized into categories and allows for users to search through by various criterion: location, date, and time. The Featured Content displays either a featured Event or Organization and is updated on a daily basis. lokalite mobile! also features a Favorites List, allowing users to add and remove Events, Organizations, and Featured content to and from it. Users will be able to map all Events, Organizations, and Featured Content with Google Maps. Users will also be able to set notifications (i.e. vibrate or play a sound) which will alert the user of an upcoming Event.
Check out lokalite\'s website for more details and features!
